About me

Hi there, My name is Aditya and I’m currently a summer intern at Los Alamos National Laboratory, New Mexico in the Data Science at Scale summer school. I’ll be starting my Ph.D. studies in Computer Science at the University of Minnesota, Twin Cities in the Fall of 2017.

I’ve a Masters degree in Computer Science from University of Utah, School of Computing in the summer of 2016. I was advised by Prof. Martin Berzins , during my time at the Scientific Computing and Imaging Institute in the University of Utah . Earlier, I got my Bachelors degree in Information Technology at Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad, India where I was mentored by Prof. P Gopalakrishna.
